dcterms:description: MPE is a popular environment in cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning, featuring a 2D space where agents interact with landmarks. The tasks involve agents moving to specific locations or formations.
dcterms:title: MPE

dcterms:description: Multi-Agent MuJoCo is a robotic locomotion control environment for multi-agent settings, where each agent controls a part of a robot to perform various tasks.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent MuJoCo

dcterms:description: SMAC is a partially observable and high-dimensional environment used in cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning studies, featuring various maps and tasks.
dcterms:title: SMAC

dcterms:description: The Cooperative Stochastic Game dataset involves multiple agents working together in a stochastic environment to achieve common goals.
